description: Describes the area or device to which this temperature measurement applies.
specification: The value of this property shall be a description of the affected device or region within the chassis to which this temperature measurement applies.

enumDescriptions.Intake: The intake point of the chassis
enumDescriptions.Exhaust: The exhaust point of the chassis
enumDescriptions.Upper: The upper portion of the chassis
enumDescriptions.Lower: The lower portion of the chassis
